name: My Pet Escape: Rescue the Dog!
name_original: My Pet Escape: Rescue the Dog!
description:
Don't stop! You and some other dogs have just escaped from the pound. Run through the traffic of the city so no one can catch you again! But, be careful not to hit the cars: you don't want to get injured, do you?

Choose you favorite dog and feel the wind and the speed on your face while you dodge all the cars. Escaping from the pound wasn't the hardest part of the plan: You still have to arrive to a safe place.

Run for as long as you can and enjoy your freedom!

GAME HIGHLIGHTS:
- 7 Unlockable Dogs
- Daily Rewards
- Custom Difficulty
- Unlockable Game Modes
- Custom Weather
